instructions: If you haven't already, add their Gmail address to your Google Contacts . On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Maps app and sign in. Learn how to sign in . Tap Account Circle and then Location sharing and then Add people . Choose how long you want to share your location. Tap Select People . If you re asked about your contacts, give Google Maps access. Choose who you want to share with. Tap Share .

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Maps app and sign in. Learn how to sign in . Tap Account Circle and then Location sharing and then Add people . Tap More and then Copy to clipboard . People with this link can see your location for as long as you choose, up to 72 hours.

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Maps app . Choose the public transit route you want to take. After you start navigation, tap Share trip . Select the person you want to share with. Tap Share .
On your phone or tablet, open the Google Maps app . Tap Account Circle and then Location sharing . Tap a contact who s shared with you before. Tap Request and then Request .
